title: 'Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty' Episode 2 Recap
description:
The Ringer's Bill Simmons and Joe House discuss episode 2 of HBO's 'Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty'.

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Joe House
Producer: Kyle Crichton
